selected_skills.name: extract_text_from_image
selected_skills.purpose: Extract text from the image to identify counts of shiny buses and matte things.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the image hash to extract all text from the image and identify the relevant counts.

selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: Perform numeric comparison between the counts of shiny buses and matte things.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the extracted counts to perform a comparison operation.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: Format the final answer in the required multiple-choice format.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the result of the comparison to map to the correct option label.
